data.englishTranslation: Whenever something happened that pleased him or made him happy, the Prophet would prostrate himself in gratitude to Allah, the Blessed, the All-Mighty.
data.arabicVerse: كَانَ النَّبِيُّ ﷺ إذَا أتَاهُ أَمْرٌ يَسُرُّهُ أَوْ يُسَرُّ بِهِ؛ خَرَّ سَاجِداً شُكْراً لله تَبَارَكَ وَ تَعَالَى
